RCE-CVE-2025-32710

Windows Remote Desktop Services Vulnerability Allows Remote Code Execution

  1. ğŸ“¦ Install Dependensi
  1. ğŸ”“ Beri Izin Eksekusi

ğŸ› ï¸ Cara Penggunaan

â–¶ï¸ Jalankan skrip:

Anda akan melihat menu utama. Pilih sesuai kebutuhan:

ğŸ¯ Opsi 1: Serang Target Tunggal

ğŸ”¹ Masukkan IP:PORT â†’ eksploitasi langsung â†’ tawarkan verifikasi

ğŸ“‹ Opsi 2: Serang Massal (berhasil.txt)

ğŸ”¹ Gunakan hasil dari Opsi 3 â†’ eksploitasi per target â†’ verifikasi otomatis

ğŸ” Opsi 3: Scan RDP Canggih

ğŸ”¹ Masukkan IP Range â†’ hasil ke scan_lengkap.txt & berhasil.txt

ğŸ”¥ Opsi 4: Scan & Serang Otomatis

ğŸ”¹ Full otomatis: Scan -> Attack -> Verify -> Save -> Cleanup

ğŸšª Opsi 0: Keluar

ğŸ”¹ Keluar dari aplikasi

ğŸ“‚ Struktur File Output

FileKeterangan
berhasil.txtğŸ’  Target potensial hasil scan
scan_lengkap.txtğŸ“„ Output mentah dari Nmap
cok.txtğŸ† Daftar target yang berhasil dieksploitasi & diverifikasi

ğŸ’¡ Contoh Alur Kerja (Workflow)

ğŸ¯ Target: Eksploitasi otomatis semua server RDP di 10.10.0.0/16

  1. Jalankan: ./run.sh
  2. Pilih: Opsi 4: Full Auto
  3. Masukkan range IP: 10.10.0.0/16
  4. Tunggu proses scan â†’ exploit â†’ verifikasi
  5. Periksa hasil di file: cok.txt âœ…

ğŸ§  Catatan Tambahan

  • Anda dapat memodifikasi payload untuk tujuan spesifik di file sodok.py
  • Disarankan menggunakan VPS yang tidak terkait identitas Anda untuk pengujian
  • Untuk bypass antivirus, pertimbangkan obfuscation payload

ğŸ“« Kontak

ğŸ‘¤ Author: Sincan2

Jika Anda merasa proyek ini bermanfaat, jangan lupa beri â­ di GitHub Repo untuk mendukung pengembangan lebih lanjut.

æ¼æ´æè¿°ï¼š CVE-2025-3248æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå½±å“Langflowçš„æ¼æ´ï¼Œå…è®¸è¿œç¨‹ä¸”æœªç»è®¤è¯çš„æ”»å‡»è€…é€šè¿‡ç²¾å¿ƒæ„é€ çš„HTTPè¯·æ±‚åœ¨æ˜“å—æ”»å‡»çš„Langflowå®ä¾‹ä¸Šæ‰§è¡Œä»»æ„ä»£ç ã€‚æ­¤æ¼æ´åˆ©ç”¨Pythonç¼–å†™ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå•URLæˆ–æ‰¹é‡æ‰«æï¼Œè‡ªåŠ¨æ£€æµ‹æ¼æ´ï¼Œå¹¶å…·å¤‡å‘½ä»¤æ‰§è¡Œèƒ½åŠ›ã€‚

äº§å“å‚å•†ï¼š Langflow

äº§å“åç§°ï¼š Langflow

æ¥æºï¼š https://github.com/imbas007/CVE-2025-3248

ç±»å‹ï¼š CVE-2025:github search

ä»“åº“æ–‡ä»¶

  • CVE-2025-3248.py
  • README.md

æ¥æºæ¦‚è¿°

Langflow CVE-2025-3248 Exploit

A Python-based exploit for CVE-2025-3248, which allows remote and unauthenticated attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable Langflow instances through crafted HTTP requests.

Features

  • Single URL or bulk scanning from file
  • Automatic vulnerability detection
  • Command execution capability
  • Detailed output with timing information
  • Results saved to separate files for vulnerable and non-vulnerable targets
  • Benchmark statistics for scan performance

Usage

Single URL Scan

Bulk Scan from File

Custom Command Execution

Example Output

source: https://github.com/verylazytech

entry.title: VMware ESXi & Horizon DaaS OpenSLP ç¼“å†²åŒºæº¢å‡ºæ¼æ´
entry.content:
æ¼æ´ä¿¡æ¯

æ¼æ´åç§°ï¼š VMware ESXi & Horizon DaaS OpenSLP ç¼“å†²åŒºæº¢å‡ºæ¼æ´

æ¼æ´ç¼–å·ï¼š

  • CVEï¼š CVE-2019-5544

æ¼æ´ç±»å‹ï¼š ç¼“å†²åŒºæº¢å‡º

æ¼æ´ç­‰çº§ï¼š ä¸¥é‡

æ¼æ´æè¿°ï¼š ESXiå’ŒHorizon DaaSè®¾å¤‡ä¸­çš„OpenSLPç»„ä»¶å­˜åœ¨å †æº¢å‡ºæ¼æ´ï¼Œè¿œç¨‹æ”»å‡»è€…å¯ä»¥åˆ©ç”¨æ­¤æ¼æ´æ‰§è¡Œä»»æ„ä»£ç ï¼Œæ”»å‡»éœ€è¦ç½‘ç»œè®¿é—®æƒé™ã€‚

äº§å“å‚å•†ï¼š VMware

äº§å“åç§°ï¼š ESXi & Horizon DaaS

æœç´¢è¯­æ³•ï¼š http.title:â€horizon daasâ€

æ¥æºï¼š https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12406

ç±»å‹ï¼š projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

æ¥æºæ¦‚è¿°

Description:

OpenSLP in ESXi and Horizon DaaS appliances contains a heap overwrite caused by a vulnerability in the OpenSLP component, letting remote attackers execute arbitrary code, exploit requires network access.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/51f10d5e647f
  • https://github.com/dgh05t/VMware_ESXI_OpenSLP_PoCs
  • https///github.com:dgh05t/VMware_ESXI_OpenSLP_PoCs.git
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/8a8375ae7774
  • https://github.com/HynekPetrak/CVE-2019-5544_CVE-2020-3992
  • https///github.com:HynekPetrak/CVE-2019-5544_CVE-2020-3992.git

KEV: True

Shodan Query: http.title:"horizon daas"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and wonâ€™t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
